scripts.electron:dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:9020 http://localhost:9021 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron ."
scripts.electron:staging: concurrently "npm run server:staging" "npm run dev:staging" "wait-on http://localhost:9020 http://localhost:9021 && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging electron ."
scripts.dist:dev: npm run build:dev && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron-builder --publish=never
scripts.dist:staging: npm run build:staging && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging electron-builder --publish=never
scripts.dist:prod: npm run build:prod && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --publish=never
scripts.dist:mac:dev: npm run build:dev && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron-builder --mac --publish=never
scripts.dist:mac:staging: npm run build:staging && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging electron-builder --mac --publish=never
scripts.dist:mac:prod: npm run build:prod && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --mac --publish=never
scripts.dist:win:dev: npm run build:dev && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron-builder --win --publish=never
scripts.dist:win:staging: npm run build:staging && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging electron-builder --win --publish=never
scripts.dist:win:prod: npm run build:prod && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --win --publish=never
scripts.dist:linux:dev: npm run build:dev && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron-builder --linux --publish=never
scripts.dist:linux:staging: npm run build:staging && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging electron-builder --linux --publish=never
scripts.dist:linux:prod: npm run build:prod && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --linux --publish=never
scripts.dist:all:staging: npm run build:staging && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging electron-builder -mwl --publish=never
scripts.build:ci: npm run build:prod && npm run dist:all
scripts.build:ci:staging: npm run build:staging && npm run dist:all:staging
scripts.cap:sync: npm run build:prod && npx cap sync
scripts.cap:build:android: npm run build:prod && npx cap sync && npx cap build android
